programme.title: Part 1

programme.category: Science fiction, Series, Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy

programme.title: Part 2
programme.desc: Doctor Who: Survival, S01E02, The Doctor and a number of people from Perivale follow Ace to the Cheetah-People’s world, where the Master lies in wait. He cannot leave without the Doctor's assistance.
programme.category: Science fiction, Series, Classic Sci-Fi & Fantasy

programme.title: The Dead Planet

programme.title: The Survivors

programme.title: The Escape

programme.title: The Ambush

programme.title: The Expedition

programme.title: The Ordeal

programme.title: The Rescue

programme.title: Death of a Hero
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E04, A fire in January 2007 claims the life of WWII vet Bennie Angelo. A closer look at the crime scene reveals Bennie was dead before the fire, bumping an arson case up to homicide.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E24, A mother is suspected in the murders of two of her daughters when her third daughter finally convinces police to reopen two cold cases.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E16, A police investigator discovers a letter written 16 years earlier that provides clues to a woman's murder. And a firearms expert supplies the evidence that South Carolina authorities need to put a man on trial in 2002 for a murder committed in 1961.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E06, A videotape made at an ATM machine helps police in Louisville, KY, to nab a man suspected of raping 13 women. And a DA investigator in Georgia helps crack a murder case that his father, a police chief, first worked on 30 years before.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E14, It takes nine years and the work of cutting-edge forensic toxicologists to solve the murder of a medical examiner's wife. Then, a determined Alabama sheriff reopens the case of the deaths of two babies, hoping to get their mother to confess.

programme.title: Ice Cold in Denver
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E08, On a bitter morning in 1980, radio intern Helene Pruszynski is found brutalized in a snowy field. After 37 years of fruitless leads, investigators tap into a genealogy website that gives them a lead.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E1012, A district attorney uses a clever technique--a "John Doe indictment"--to give law enforcement officials the time they need to track down the Schoolgirl Rapist from Rochester, N. Y.

programme.title: The Voice In The Lake
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E01, When 31-year-old real estate appraiser Mike Williams mysteriously vanishes while duck hunting in the Florida swamps in December of 2000, authorities suspect he accidentally drowned. For sixteen years his disappearance remains a mystery.

programme.title: Devil In Disguise
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E06, A 23-year-old teacher vanished the evening before Easter after giving confession. Her body was later found floating in a drainage canal. At the time, a key witness hinted that a member of the Catholic clergy may have been responsible.

programme.title: Green River Killer/Missing And The Dead
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E13, In 1982 and '83, Seattle's Green River Killer stalked prostitutes like game. With 49 victims, he could be the deadliest serial killer in U.S. history. Then, a passing motorist spots a fire along a road in South Carolina and calls it in.

programme.title: Diary Of A Serial Arsonist/The Lost Clue
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E10, A highly-regarded California arson investigator is suspected of setting a series of fires, and in Texas, a man is convicted of raping and murdering his 68-year-old neighbor.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E4016, DNA evidence found on a murder victim whose body had been dumped in a Dairy Queen drive-thru leads to the arrest of Houston's notorious "tourniquet killer."

programme.title: Til Death Do Us Part
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E24, Just two years into their marriage, Chuck and Cheryl Hall are torn apart when Chuck finds Cheryl murdered. Though Cheryl's family is certain they know her killer, the law isn't as sure. After several decades, a DNA match erases all doubt.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E17, A look at the case of James Allen Selby, a serial rapist who eluded police for years while attacking 11 women in five states - Oklahoma, Nevada, California, Arizona, and Colorado.

programme.title: Texas Drifter/Fingerprints/Rose Among Thorns
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E03, From England to Texas to Georgia, I.R. will go inside cold case units and watch as police use ballistics testing, old fashioned fingerprints and a new DNA data bank for criminals, to crack open the mysteries of unsolved crimes.

programme.title: Friday Night Ghosts
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E15, In late 1983, the bodies of five people abducted from a local fast food restaurant are found brutally murdered. The main suspect is long believed to be a well-connected local man, until new evidence reveals the true killers.

programme.title: Eyes of a Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E13, On February 2, 2010, two masked gunmen commit a violent robbery and shoot Michael Temple Jr., rendering him a quadriplegic for five years before his death. In this unusual cold case, DNA is used to create a sketch of the killer.

Harvest of Fire, 19960421000000 +0000, An FBI agent is sent to investigate an arson in a peaceful Amish township, but she must first gain the trust of an Amish widow suspicious of outsiders. Stars Lolita Davidovich and Patty Duke.

programme.title: Home to Roost, Part One
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S01E02, Hallmark Original Series. The O'Brien family reunites in Chesapeake Shores for the first time in years.

programme.title: Hope
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E14, While connected to the stones in an attempt to contact Homeworld Command, Chloe wakes up with Ginn’s consciousness. Eli must find a way to protect Chloe without losing Ginn. Meanwhile, Volker requires a difficult operation to save his life.

programme.title: The Hunt
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E16, While exploring a planet, the team is attacked and members are taken captive by an alien creature. The team must turn to Varro and his Lucian team for help. Meanwhile, on Destiny, Eli and Brody mistakenly trap Brody in a cryogenic device.

programme.title: Seizure
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E15, Homeworld Command tries to convince an ally they suspect might be infiltrated by the Lucian Alliance to let them use their planet to power up and dial Destiny. Meanwhile, Rush is trapped in a simulation created by Amanda Perry.

programme.title: Prototype
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S09E09, Hank Landry (Beau Bridges) and his government overseers disagree over what to do about what they found in a lab: Anubis' dangerous, genetically engineered Goa'uld creation. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: The Fourth Horseman (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S09E10, As SG-1 tries to stop the spread of a deadly virus that was caused by the devious Ori, the Jaffa Gerak works on converting the rest of the Jaffa to worshippers of the Ori. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: The Fourth Horseman (Part 2)
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S09E11, As the Jaffa Gerak amasses forces to rise against them, the Stargate team races to find an antidote to stop a deadly Ori plague from becoming a devastating global pandemic. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Collateral Damage
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S09E12, Complications arise when lieutenant Colonel Cameron Mitchell becomes the victim of powerful and dangerous technology that allows individuals to share memories with each other. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Ripple Effect
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S09E13, Stargate Command is baffled by the arrival of several virtually identical SG-1 teams and must find a way to return them to their respective universes before calamity occurs. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Stronghold
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S09E14, Daniel fears the worst when Teal'c mysteriously disappears after investigating corruption. His fears are confirmed when he finds that Jaffa have been kidnapped and brainwashed. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Ethon
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S09E15, SG-1 sets out to destroy a massive and deadly weapon invented by their increasingly powerful foe, the Ori. If not, the Caledonian Federation and its people will be destroyed. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Off The Grid
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S09E16, Hank Landry (Beau Bridges) and the rest of the Stargate team plan an offensive when they learn that the Goa'uld Ba'al is in the United States and is once again regaining power. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: The Scourge
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S09E17, A crop of genetically engineered insects turns deadly, forcing the SG-1 team to destroy them before they and the visiting international diplomats becoming their next victims. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Arthur's Mantle
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S09E18, While Teal'c sets off to investigate foul play on a Jaffa planet, Mitchell, Carter and Daniel become out of phase while experimenting with a powerful and ancient device. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Camelot
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S09E20, As the Ori's all out assault. looms closer, lieutenant Colonel Cameron Mitchell and Daniel Jackson race to locate a device that will obliterate the evil enemy once and for all. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Crusade
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S09E19, Vala returns to Stargate Command to deliver startling news: the Ori have been building military forces, and plan to launch crusades against their dissidents in the near future. Ben Browder, Michael Shanks, Amanda Tapping, and Christopher Judge star.

programme.title: Home

programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S06E09, Dylan asks Toni to marry him. An earthquake rocks the major Los Angeles area, spooking Colin. Donna sees her mother in a photograph of the 1969 Rose Court contestants, but Felice refuses to explain herself.

programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S06E10, The guys kidnap Dylan for his bachelor party. The girls throw a much wilder time for bride-to-be Toni.

programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S06E11, Donna makes the Rose Court, and her mother reveals her reasons for not supporting her in the pageant.

programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S06E12, Colin and Susan leave for New York to spend Thanksgiving with their families. The gang decides to spend the holiday together, and David invites his mother to join them.

programme.title: Courting
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S06E13, Joe rejects a plea bargain and decides to go to trial. The Associated Press picks up Brandon's story about the trial for nationwide syndication. Colin babysits for Erin while Kelly and David are at the trial.

programme.title: Fortunate Son
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S06E14, Donna fills in for Lisa at a convenience store. A young boy is caught stealing a teddy bear for his brother's birthday, but Donna covers for him. Brandon alienates Nat and Susan as he gets carried away during the After Dark's charity casino night.

programme.title: Angels We Have Heard on High
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S06E15, Cindy surprises Brandon by coming to visit for Christmas. Joe tries to keep an antsy Donna in suspense about her Christmas/birthday present.

programme.title: Fade In, Fade Out
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S06E17, Kelly's father swoops into town, and once again sweeps her off of her feet with promises of a relationship. Nat is reunited with an old-flame.

programme.title: Snowbound
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S06E18, Kelly takes refuge back with Colin, and ends up on a bender.

programme.title: Nancy's Choice
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S06E19, Susan is nominated for a college journalism award for her story about a girl's decision to have an abortion. Valerie arranges a meeting between Colin and a knowledgeable art buyer in the hopes of encouraging Colin to get clean and focus on his career.

programme.title: Flying
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S06E20, Valerie's really annoying friend Ginger returns to town. Clare and Donna confront Kelly after finding drugs in the apartment. Brandon, Steve and Joe accept Jonathan's invitation to go flying in biplanes.

programme.title: Bleeding Hearts
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S06E21, Valerie tries to pacify Ginger by setting her up with Jonathan. Donna's sorority asks students to go without sex for 24 hours in order to promote abstinence as a means of preventing venereal diseases. Clare bets that Steve cannot make good on his pledge.

programme.title: All This and Mary Too
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S06E22, Colin visits Kelly and announces that he has kicked his cocaine habit. Kelly gets a roommate, a troubled teenage runaway named Tara. Valerie has the house to herself as Steve and Brandon leave for a ski weekend with Clare, Susan and David.

programme.title: Leap of Faith
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S06E23, Brandon and Susan spend the weekend at her parents' house. Colin and Valerie's new relationship upsets David and Kelly. Joe's older brother Hank comes to town and tries to discourage him from undergoing surgery.

programme.title: Trapped Beneath the Sea, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E02, As the crippled oil rig sinks and floods with water, Cody, Neely, and Stephanie begin a desperate rescue effort to save the two young couples, and themselves, until the Baywatch lifeguards can arrive to help.

programme.title: Hot Stuff
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E03, Kaye Morgan asks Hobie to volunteer at a school for young blind children. Things take a dangerous turn when a huge brush fire traps Hobie and the blind children in the hills, and Mitch is the only one who can save them.

programme.title: Surf's Up
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E04, Caroline tries to stop her sister from making the worst mistake of her life. Cody and Neely rescue two surfers that fall ill due to a highly polluted beach. Mitch enlists the Beach Boys for a benefit concert to raise money to clean up the pollution.

programme.title: To Everything There is a Season
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E05, Mitch's mother arrives in town for a visit, and after some strange occurrences, he insists she sees a doctor. Meanwhile, Cody loses the motivation to continue his Olympic training and it is up to Stephanie to reinspire him.

programme.title: Leap of Faith
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E06, Stephanie, CJ, and Caroline go on a girls-only junior lifeguard trip to Catalina which turns dire when two of the girls get trapped in a flooded cave. Meanwhile, a woman who dies in a car accident bequeaths an odd inheritance to Mitch…

programme.title: Face of Fear
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E07, Hobie's new friend Isaac is an angry kid who will do anything to get his father's attention. His risky behavior is a problem for the lifeguards. Meanwhile, Caroline meets a jockey who has lost the will to race after an accident.

programme.title: Hit and Run
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E08, Logan borrows Cody's car without permission and has an accident, then lies to the police. Meanwhile, the Baywatch team settles an internal dispute with a paintball war and C.J. takes in an injured sea lion, causing problems with her roommates.

programme.title: Home is Where the Heat is
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E09, Matt Brody returns to Baywatch and ends up trapped on a yacht with Neely when a group of ruthless pirates takes hostages. Meanwhile, Joey's past may jeopardize her adoption by Mitch.

programme.title: Sweet Dreams
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E10, Logan and Caroline’s relationship hits a new low when Caroline returns his engagement ring, but things change when a baby is left in Logan’s possession. Meanwhile, Cody must overcome yet another setback to his Olympic career.

programme.title: The Incident
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E11, Caroline blames herself for a teen's death in a fiery nighttime boating accident and goes through Critical Incident Stress. Pushing everyone away, Caroline begins partying to distract from her guilt. Can the team help her recover from her PTSD?

programme.title: Beauty and the Beast
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E12, A mysterious, unseen creature begins attacking beachgoers, and it is up to the Baywatch team to find the creature. Meanwhile, Inside Sports Magazine wants a lifeguard for their swimsuit issue. Neely and Caroline compete for the cover.

programme.title: Desperate Encounter
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E13, Logan must help his friend Carmen raise $50,000 to keep her ranch, and Jessie Lee Harris is back in town just in time to help. Mitch finds himself in a deadly race for justice during his vacation in Baja, Mexico.

programme.title: Baywatch Angels
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E14, Stephanie, Caroline, and CJ become Charlie’s Angels in a fun fantasy romp through 70's television as they try and catch an escaped psychopath bent on killing lifeguards.

programme.title: Bash at the Beach
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E15, CJ rescues pro wrestler Hulk Hogan, who then tells the Baywatch team that he's in town with Randy Savage to try and prevent the closure of the Venice Boys' Youth Center. Hogan must take on Ric Flair in a cage match to prevent the closure.

programme.title: Freefall
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E16, Mitch is convinced by Stephanie's boyfriend Tom to go sky-surfing. Things go horribly wrong when Mitch's parachute fails to deploy! Back on the beach, CJ's lifeguarding duties are impeded when she begins dating a celebrity.

programme.title: Sail Away
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E17, Stephanie is recruiting lifeguards for the annual Sailing Regatta where they will compete against South Bay, and Neely is taking the competition very seriously. Meanwhile, Mitch finds out Joey has grandparents who want to care for her.

programme.title: Lost and Found
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E18, Mitch and Caroline rescue a woman who gets amnesia falling off the pier and must find her father to help her recover her memories. CJ meets a wheelchair-bound man who’s determined to get wheelchair access across the beach to the water.
